price: Ikutilah apa yang diturunkan kepadamu dari Tuhan-mu dan janganlah kamu mengikuti pemimpin-pemimpin selain-Nya528.  Amat sedikitlah kamu mengambil pelajaran (darinya).
arabic: ٱتَّبِعُواْ مَآ أُنزِلَ إِلَيۡكُم مِّن رَّبِّكُمۡ وَلَا تَتَّبِعُواْ مِن دُونِهِۦٓ أَوۡلِيَآءَۗ قَلِيلٗا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
footnotes: 528.  Maksudnya pemimpin-pemimpin yang membawamu kepada kesesatan.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: ittabiʿū mā unzila ilaykum min rabbikum walā tattabiʿū min dūnihi awliyāa qalīlan mā tadhakkarūna
